title: Coronavirus lockdown: How can we lift restrictions?
description: What is the path to normality as coronavirus leaves countries in lockdown?
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
When can I see my family? Have friends round? Have a night out? A holiday? Or even go back to work? When can children go back to school?
Lockdowns have been essential for containing the spread of coronavirus, but they are causing… [+8469 chars]
